keyboardHelpDialog.twentyScreen.moveGrab.value: Move Grabbed Object in Counting Area

keyboardHelpDialog.moveGrabbedObjectToOp.value: Move Grabbed Object to Opposite Side

automaticallyHearPhraseDescription.value: Hear phrase read automatically each time addends change. When toggled on, auto-read phrase may interfere with screen readers.

numberModelTypeDescription.value: Choose between a traditional number bond representation or a proportional bar model.

sumScreenNumberModelOrientationDescripti.value: On the sum screen only, this changes the orientation of the total in the number decomposition model.

level3.value: Missing addend in a decomposition equation ({{yValue}} only)

level4.value: Missing addend in a sum equation ({{yValue}} only)

level6.value: Missing addend in a decomposition equation ({{yValueMin}}-{{yValueMax}})

level7.value: Missing addend or total in a sum equation ({{yValueMin}}-{{yValueMax}})

playAreaIntroSentence.value: There are left and right counting areas with fun objects. You can organize objects inside a counting area or move them between counting areas to break total apart in different ways.

intro.value: Break apart numbers { $min }-{ $max } by moving fun objects between counting areas.

ten.value: Break apart numbers { $min }-{ $max } by sliding magic beads, grouping and changing kitten colors, or interacting with a number line.

twenty.value: Break apart numbers { $min }-{ $max } by moving and interacting with fun and magic objects in counting areas.

sum.value: Create totals of { $min }-{ $max } by adding or removing magic beads or kittens, or addends to an interactive number line.

game.value: Challenge yourself to find missing addends or create sums from { $min }-{ $max } with two numbers.

playArea.value: { a11y_playAreaIntroSentence } A decomposition phrase and a   { a11y_numberBondOrBarModelLowercase } represent the total number broken apart into two addends. Additionally, choose any total from { $min } to { $max }, automatically organize objects into rows, or swap addends.

controlArea.value: Reset the sim to start over.

objectsPattern.value:
{ $total ->
  [one] Currently, { $total } object in counting area.
 *[other] Currently, { $total } objects in counting areas.
}

bothHidden.value: Currently, { $total } total, both counting areas hidden.

interactionHint.value: Count or grab an object. Organize or move objects in counting area to play.

playArea.value:
{ $representationType ->
  [numberLine] There is a number line showing total as a green line broken into two sections, yellow on left and blue on right. A movable knob changes how total is broken apart by changing lengths of yellow and blue sections. A decomposition phrase, { a11y_numberBondOrBarModelLowercase }, and equation represent how total is broken  apart into two addends. Additionally, choose any total from { $min } to { $max } or swap addends.
  [beads] There are movable yellow and blue beads you can slide along a wire to organize or change color to change how total is broken apart. A decomposition phrase, { a11y_numberBondOrBarModelLowercase }, and equation represent how total is broken  apart into two addends. Additionally, choose any total from { $min } to { $max }, automatically organize  objects, or swap addends.
  [kittens] There are freely movable yellow and blue kittens you can organize or change color to change how total is broken apart. A decomposition phrase, { a11y_numberBondOrBarModelLowercase }, and equation represent how total is broken  apart into two addends. Additionally, choose any total from { $min } to { $max }, automatically organize  objects, or swap addends.
  *[location] { a11y_playAreaIntroSentence } Additionally, choose any total from { $min } to { $max }, automatically organize  objects, or swap addends.
}

currentDetails.value:
{ $shownSides ->
  [none] Counting area currently hidden.
  [right] Currently, { $total } total, left counting area hidden.
  [left] Currently, { $total } total, right counting area hidden.
  *[both] { $representationType ->
            [numberLine] Currently, total of { $total } splits colored sections with addend splitter knob in counting area.
            [beads] Currently, { $total } total { $itemType } split by color in counting area.
            [kittens] Currently, { $total } total { $itemType } split by color in counting area.
            *[location] { a11y_introScreen_screenSummary_currentDetails_objectsPattern }
          }
}

playArea.value:
{ $representationType ->
  [numberLine] Total is shown on number line with a green line broken into two sections, yellow on left and blue 
               on right. A movable knob changes how total is broken apart by changing lengths of yellow and blue 
               sections. Number spinners add one or remove one from yellow or blue section. An addition phrase, { a11y_numberBondOrBarModelLowercase }, and equation represent how two numbers 
               add to total. Additionally, create totals from { $min } to { $max } or swap addends.
  *[other] There are yellow and blue { $representation } you can move to organize or change color to find 
           different ways to create a total number of { $representation }. An addition phrase, { a11y_numberBondOrBarModelLowercase }, and equation represent how two numbers 
           add to total. Additionally, create totals from { $min } to { $max }, automatically organize objects, or swap addends.
}

currentDetails.value:
{ $shown ->
  [none] Currently, total hidden, counting area hidden.
  [total] Currently, total of { $total }, counting area hidden.
  [countingArea] { $representationType ->
                   [numberLine] Currently, total hidden, created by adding lengths of yellow and blue sections.
                   *[other] Currently, total hidden, created by adding all { $itemType }.
                 }
  *[all] { $representationType ->
           [numberLine] Currently, total of { $total } created by adding lengths of yellow and blue sections.
           *[other] Currently, { $total } total { $itemType } created by adding all { $itemType }.
         }
}

interactionHint.value:
{ $representationType ->
  [beads] Navigate to and grab bead to create groups, or move across divider to change color. Add or remove beads with number spinners to change total.
  [kittens] Choose kitten to move, organize, or change color. Add or remove beads with number spinners to change total.
  *[numberLine] Move addend splitter knob to change length of yellow and blue sections that create total. Add one or remove one from yellow or blue section to change total.
}

releasedHelpText.value: Navigate and choose { $item } to move. Space or enter to grab or release.

grabbedHelpTextPattern.value:
{ $representationType ->
  [beads] Move one or more beads to create groups.
  *[other] Move { $item } in or between left and right counting areas.
}

leadingParagraph.value:
{ $totalVisible ->
  [hidden] Total is hidden
  *[shown] { $total ->
               [1] Right now, 1 total { $item } in Counting area.
               *[other] Right now, { $total } total { $items } in Counting area.
           }
}

accessibleHelpTextCollapsed.value:
{ $screenType ->
  [other] View decomposition equation.
  *[sumScreen] View sum equation.
}

accessibleHelpText.value: Choose representation for counting area.
Move with arrows or W, A, S, D keys. Change color with space or enter.

kittenPattern.value:
{ $descriptor ->
  [first] First { $color} Kitten
  [last] Last { $color } Kitten
  [only] Only { $color } Kitten
  *[other] { $color } Kitten
}

crossedDividerContextResponse.value:
{ $side ->
  [left] Bead now yellow on left.
  *[right] Bead now blue on right.
}

accessibleHelpText.value: Move knob to change how addends are split.

contextResponse.value:
{ $addendsShowing ->
  [addendsVisible] { $total } is split into { $left } and { $right }.
  *[addendsHidden] { $sections ->
                     [smallerAndLarger] { $total } is split into smaller and larger sections.
                     [equal] { $total } is split into equal sections.
                     *[largerAndSmaller] { $total } is split into larger and smaller sections.
                   }
}

leadingCountOn.value: Number line shows a green line representing total and a blue jump from knob to total:

leadingCountFromZero.value: Number line shows a green line representing total, a yellow jump from left edge to knob, and a blue jump from knob to total:

countOnLeftAddendPattern.value: Left addend, { $left }, marked on number line

countOnJumpPattern.value: Jump of length { $right } starts at { $start } and ends at total

countFromZeroLeftAddendPattern.value: Left addend, { $left }, is shown above jump from left edge to knob

countFromZeroRightAddendPattern.value: Right addend, { $right }, is shown above jump from { $start } to total

accessibleHelpText.value: Choose total for counting area.

accessibleHelpTextCollapsed.value:
{ $screenType ->
  [sumScreen] Phrase describes the sum equation.
  *[other] Phrase tells how total is decomposed.
}

noVoiceAccessibleParagraph.value: There is no voice found on this device for the selected language. Your device may support downloading additional voices for this language.

accessibleHelpText.value: Hear phrase read aloud.
Choose between two languages to hear and read phrase.
Represent decomposition as a { a11y_numberBondOrBarModelLowercase }.

numberBondAccessibleParagraph.value:
{ $orientation ->
  [totalOnBottom] Number bond has three circles arranged with two on top and one underneath like a triangle. Top circles tell the addends. Left circle is left addend, right circle is right addend. Bottom circle is total.
  *[totalOnTop] Number bond has three circles arranged with one circle on top and two underneath like a triangle. Bottom circles tell the addends. Top circle tells total number of objects, left circle is left addend, right circle is right addend.
}

numberBondStateAccessibleParagraph.value:
{ $orientation ->
  [totalOnTop] Right now, { $total } in top circle, { $left } in left circle, { $right } in right circle.
  *[totalOnBottom] Right now, { $left } in left circle, { $right } in right circle, { $total } in bottom circle.
}

barModelStateAccessibleParagraph.value:
{ $orientation ->
  [totalOnTop] Right now, { $total } in top rectangle, { $left } and { $right } in bottom rectangle, split into { $proportions } sections.
  *[totalOnBottom] Right now, { $left } and { $right } top rectangle, split into { $proportions } sections, { $total } in bottom rectangle.
}

barModelAccessibleParagraph.value:
{ $orientation ->
  [totalOnTop] Two matching rectangles are stacked on top of each other. Top rectangle is not split and tells total number of objects, bottom rectangle is split by addends, showing two sections that adjust based on value of addends.
  *[totalOnBottom] Two matching rectangles are stacked on top of each other. Top rectangle is split by addends, showing two sections that adjust based on value of addends. Bottom rectangle is not split and tells the sum of two addends, also called the total.
}

accessibleHelpText.value: Create groups of 5 { $representation }.

accessibleContextResponse.value:
{ $representationType ->
  [kittens] { $distribution }, kittens in rows.
  [beads] Divider separates groups by color.
  *[other] Left and right counting areas organized into rows.
}

accessibleContextResponseGameCombined.value: One array with combined colors, kittens in rows.

accessibleContextResponseGameSeparate.value: Two arrays separated by color, kittens in rows.

accessibleHelpText.value: Switches left and right addends.

accessibleContextResponse.value:
{ $representationType ->
  [attribute] { $leftAddend } yellow, { $rightAddend } blue.
  [numberLine] { $leftAddend } in left yellow section, { $rightAddend } in right blue section.
  *[other] { $leftAddend } on left, { $rightAddend } on right.
}

accessibleHelpTextPattern.value: Show or hide counting area and both addends in { a11y_numberBondOrBarModelLowercase }.
Show or hide { $addend } counting area and { $addend } addend in { a11y_numberBondOrBarModelLowercase }.

accessibleHelpText.value:
{ $representationType ->
  [kittens] Add or remove one { $color } kitten.
  [beads] Add or remove one { $color } bead.
  *[other] Add or remove one from { $addend } section.
}

incrementContextResponse.value:
{ $representationType ->
  [kittens] One { $color } kitten added to counting area.
  [beads] One { $color } bead added to counting area.
  *[other] One added to { $addend } { $color } section of total.
}

decrementContextResponse.value:
{ $representationType ->
  [kittens] One { $color } kitten removed from counting area.
  [beads] One { $color } bead removed from counting area.
  *[other] One removed from { $addend } { $color } section of total.
}

accessibleHelpText.value: Choose where to start counting. Count on from first addend to get total or count to first addend starting at zero.
Show or hide sum of addends.
Show or hide addend values.

accessibleContextResponseChecked.value: Addends are { $leftAddend } and { $rightAddend }, labeled on number line.

accessibleHelpText.value: Show or hide tick mark numbers on number line.
Show or hide total jump on number line.

accessibleContextResponseChecked.value: Total jump of { $total } shown and labeled.

challengePrompt.value:
{ $decompositionOrSum ->
  [decomposition] { $total } can be decomposed into { $leftAddend } and { $rightAddend }?
  *[sum] { $leftAddend } plus { $rightAddend } equals { $total }?
}

numberLineSentence.value: Right now, number line shows a green line representing total and two end-to-end jumps: a { a11y_gameScreen_countingArea_numberLineLeftAddendColor } jump from left edge, then a { a11y_gameScreen_countingArea_numberLineRightAddendColor } jump to total.

numberLineAddends.value: { $leftAddend } is shown above { a11y_gameScreen_countingArea_numberLineLeftAddendColor } jump representing left addend. {$rightAddend} is shown above { a11y_gameScreen_countingArea_numberLineRightAddendColor } jump representing right addend.

hiddenAccessibleParagraph.value: Right now, counting area is hidden.

accessibleParagraph.value:
{ $levelType ->
  [bondBar] Can { $total } be decomposed into { $theirGuess } and { $right }? Press check if ready or choose another number.
  [decomposition] Does { $total } equal { $left } plus { $theirGuess }? Press check if ready or choose another number.
  *[sumEquation] Does { $theirGuess } plus { $right } equal { $total }? Press check if ready or choose another number.
}

answerChoices.value:
{ $challengeType ->
  [leftAddend] Left Addend Choices
  [rightAddend] Right Addend Choices
  *[total] Sum Choices
}

accessibleHelpText.value: Show or hide counting area.

{ $levelNumber ->
  [1] Find a missing addend in a { a11y_numberBondOrBarModelLowercase } with total between 2 and 10.
  [2] Find a missing addend in a { a11y_numberBondOrBarModelLowercase } with total always 10.
  [3] Find a missing addend in a decomposition equation with total always 10.
  [4] Find a missing addend in a sum equation with total always 10.
  [5] Find a missing addend in a { a11y_numberBondOrBarModelLowercase } with total between 11 and 20.
  [6] Find a missing addend in a decomposition equation with total between 11 and 20.
  [7] Find a missing addend or total in a sum equation with total between 11 and 20.
  *[8] Find a missing addend in a sum equation using the number line with total between 0 and 20.
}

accessibleHeading.value:
{ $levelType ->
  [decompositionEquation] Decomposition Equation Challenge
  [sumEquation] Sum Equation Challenge
  *[bondOrBarModel] { a11y_numberBondOrBarModel } Challenge
}

accessibleHelpText.value:
{ $levelType ->
  [kittens] { $addendOrSum ->
              [addend] Choose number for { a11y_gameScreen_challengeType } to add { $color } Kittens to Counting Area. If needed, count, organize, or hide Kittens to help solve challenge. Check Answer to submit.
              *[sum] Choose number for Sum of blue and yellow kittens. If needed, count, organize, or hide Kittens in Counting Area to help solve challenge. Check Answer to submit.
            }
  *[numberLine] Choose number for { a11y_gameScreen_challengeType } to make dotted jump have that length. Check Answer to submit and make dotted jump turn { $color } if correct.
}
Create groups of 5 Kittens

answerSelected.value:
{ $representationType ->
  [kittens] {$value} chosen for { a11y_gameScreen_challengeType }. {$value} { $color } kittens now in Counting Area.
  [numberLine] {$value} chosen for { a11y_gameScreen_challengeType }. Unknown jump now {$value} on number line.
  *[sum] { $value } chosen for sum. No new kittens added or removed from Counting Area.
}

correctAnswer.value:
{ $levelType ->
  [decomposition] Correct. { $total } can be decomposed into { $leftAddend } and { $rightAddend }.
  *[sum] Correct! { $leftAddend } plus { $rightAddend } equals { $total }. Nice work.
}

incorrectAnswer.value:
{ $levelType ->
  [decomposition] Not quite. { $total } cannot be decomposed into { $leftAddend } and { $rightAddend }. Try again.
  *[sum] Not quite. { $leftAddend } plus { $rightAddend } does not equal { $total }. Try again.
}

accessibleHelpText.value: Reset challenge back to beginning.

labelInnerContent.value: Move grabbed { $item } to { $addend } side with { $key } key.
Adjust number of objects with arrow keys.

jumpToFirstLabelInnerContent.value: Jump to first kitten with Home key.

jumpToLastLabelInnerContent.value: Jump to last kitten with End key.

changeColorLabelInnerContent.value: Change color with Space or Enter key.
